dante-database-dump-intro: This page allows you to produce a dump of the '''entire database''' of this dantewiki. For more information consult [[Help:DanteBackup]].
dante-page-dump-intro: This page allows you to produce a dump of this dantewiki. For more information consult [[Help:DanteBackup]].
dante-page-restore-intro: This page allows you to restore a dump of this dantewiki. Please select a file to be used for restoring. For more information consult [[Help:DanteRestore]].
select-local-file: Select a file from your local machine
restore-from-aws: Select one of the following AWS S3 files
dumpform-header: Identification: What is the name of the dump?
dumpform-srcfeatures: Source: What shall the dump include?
dumpform-rc: Database:Shall we produce a database dump?
dumpform-rf: Files: Shall uploaded files be included?
dumpform-rb: Pages: Which pages shall be included in the page dump?
dumpform-ra: Revisions: Which revisions shall be included in the page dump?
dumpform-up: Files: For the uploaded files, include:
dumpform-features: Features: Which further things do you require?
dumpform-target: Target: Where shall the dump be stored?
dumpform-debug: Show debug output (only advanced users and only for AWS S3)
dbdumpform-target: Where shall the database dump be stored?
dbdumpform-features: Choose features of the database dump:
restform-restore-from-s3: Select a page dump file for restoring
restore-from-url: Enter a URL for restoring from the file it designates
aws-prefs-key: Access Key of an Amazon AWS IAM User with rights to write to S3. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
aws-prefs-skey: Secret Access Key of that Amazon AWS IAM User. Keep confidential. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
aws-prefs-bucket: Name of an AWS S3 bucket. Example: dantebackup.iuk.one. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
aws-prefs-region: Name of an AWS region. Example: eu-central-1. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
aws-prefs-encpw: Encryption password for user-controlled encryption before S3 upload. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
prefs-ssh-host: Name and domain (FQDN) of host used for SSH backup. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
prefs-ssh-dump-user: User name for user on SSH backup host which receives the dump. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
prefs-ssh-dump-pw: Password for user on SSH backup host which receives the dump. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
prefs-ssh-restore-user: User name for user on SSH backup host which provides the dumped data. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
prefs-ssh-restore-pw: Password for user on SSH backup host which provides the dumped data. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
prefs-ssh-encpw: Encryption password for user-controlled encryption before SSH upload. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
prefs-git: Token to write initial contents to the respective github repository. For developer use only.
help-filter: Removes all hidden contents. See [[Help:Hidden Contents]]
help-enc: Encryption ensures privacy of content on dump storage media. Set password in [[Special:Preferences]] in tab DanteWiki. Make sure to remember the password, as without it you cannot restore the contents of the dump file. If a password is set for the user and you do a database dump without encryption then the password is visible as part of the database dump.
